attributes.action: put the email system for no.10 online as soon as possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to allow more people to contact the pm and avoid contact with the people in the website whose time can be spent doing other more difficult tasks.

rejection.details: The Number 10 email system is currently being upgraded. We expect it to return shortly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
